Bmp180(Resolution)

Represents a BMP180 Sensor.

Declaration
public Bmp180(Resolution res = Resolution.UltrHighResolution)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Sting.Measurements.External_Libraries.Resolution res

Determines the used resolution of the sensor. The higher the resolution the more reliable the measurement results. As default UltraHighResolution is used.

Initiates the component, making it ready for use.

Declaration
public Task<bool> InitComponentAsync(int pin = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 pin

The data pin the component uses. If the component uses the I2C bus, the pin parameter is not required.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Boolean>

Returns True if initiation was successful.
